
---
layout: post
title:  'Canvas-PivotGrid-calculated-fields-&-equations'
author: 'jakub.siuda@exceedra.com'
exerpt: >
  How to add a calculated field to an existing pivot 

---

  <p><strong><span style="font-size: 16px;">1. Before we start</span></strong><br />
<br />
Given the following xml to generate a simple pivot grid:<br />
<br />
</p>
<pre>&lt;Results&gt;<br />&nbsp; &lt;FieldProperties&gt;<br />&nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;Property Code="SEASON" &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Name="Season" &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;PivotType="Column" /&gt;<br />&nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;Property Code="TEAM" &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Name="Team name" &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; PivotType="Row" /&gt;<br />&nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;Property Code="POINTS" &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Name="Points" &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;PivotType="Value" &nbsp; Type="INT" /&gt;<br />&nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;Property Code="GOALS_FOR" &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;Name="Goals for" &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; PivotType="Value" &nbsp; Type="INT" /&gt;<br />&nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;Property Code="GOALS_AGAINST" &nbsp;Name="Goals against" &nbsp; PivotType="Value" &nbsp; Type="INT" /&gt;<br />&nbsp; &lt;/FieldProperties&gt;<br />&nbsp; &lt;Fields&gt;<br />&nbsp;   &lt;Field &nbsp; SEASON="13/14" &nbsp; TEAM="Arsenal" &nbsp; &nbsp; POINTS="79" &nbsp; GOALS_FOR="68" &nbsp; GOALS_AGAINST="41" /&gt;<br />&nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;Field &nbsp; SEASON="13/14" &nbsp; TEAM="Man Utd" &nbsp; &nbsp; POINTS="64" &nbsp; GOALS_FOR="64" &nbsp; GOALS_AGAINST="43" /&gt;<br />&nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;Field &nbsp; SEASON="13/14" &nbsp; TEAM="Liverpool" &nbsp; POINTS="84" &nbsp; GOALS_FOR="101" &nbsp;GOALS_AGAINST="50" /&gt;<br />&nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;Field &nbsp; SEASON="13/14" &nbsp; TEAM="Chelsea" &nbsp; &nbsp; POINTS="82" &nbsp; GOALS_FOR="71" &nbsp; GOALS_AGAINST="27" /&gt;<br />&nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;Field &nbsp; SEASON="14/15" &nbsp; TEAM="Arsenal" &nbsp; &nbsp; POINTS="75" &nbsp; GOALS_FOR="71" &nbsp; GOALS_AGAINST="36" /&gt;<br />&nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;Field &nbsp; SEASON="14/15" &nbsp; TEAM="Man Utd" &nbsp; &nbsp; POINTS="70" &nbsp; GOALS_FOR="62" &nbsp; GOALS_AGAINST="37" /&gt;<br />&nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;Field &nbsp; SEASON="14/15" &nbsp; TEAM="Liverpool" &nbsp; POINTS="62" &nbsp; GOALS_FOR="52" &nbsp; GOALS_AGAINST="48" /&gt;<br />&nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;Field &nbsp; SEASON="14/15" &nbsp; TEAM="Chelsea" &nbsp; &nbsp; POINTS="87" &nbsp; GOALS_FOR="73" &nbsp; GOALS_AGAINST="32" /&gt;<br />&nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;Field &nbsp; SEASON="15/16" &nbsp; TEAM="Arsenal" &nbsp; &nbsp; POINTS="71" &nbsp; GOALS_FOR="65" &nbsp; GOALS_AGAINST="36" /&gt;<br />&nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;Field &nbsp; SEASON="15/16" &nbsp; TEAM="Man Utd" &nbsp; &nbsp; POINTS="66" &nbsp; GOALS_FOR="49" &nbsp; GOALS_AGAINST="35" /&gt;<br />&nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;Field &nbsp; SEASON="15/16" &nbsp; TEAM="Liverpool" &nbsp; POINTS="60" &nbsp; GOALS_FOR="63" &nbsp; GOALS_AGAINST="50" /&gt;<br />&nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;Field &nbsp; SEASON="15/16" &nbsp; TEAM="Chelsea" &nbsp; &nbsp; POINTS="50" &nbsp; GOALS_FOR="59" &nbsp; GOALS_AGAINST="53" /&gt;<br />&nbsp; &lt;/Fields&gt;<br />&lt;/Results&gt;</pre>
<br />
<img alt="" src="data:image/png;base64," /><br />
<br />
<br />
<strong><span style="font-size: 16px;">2. Creating calculated field</span></strong><br />
<br />
Let's say we want to present another detail on our pivot, which is the goal difference.<br />
Obviously, we could just set up the database to return such information but it's easier and faster to use a calculated field.<br />
<br />
The only thing we need to add is an additional property of type "CalculatedField" with a proper equation attribute, as shown below:<br />
<br />
<pre>&lt;Results&gt;<br />&nbsp; &lt;FieldProperties&gt;<br />&nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;Property Code="SEASON" &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Name="Season" &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;PivotType="Column" /&gt;<br />&nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;Property Code="TEAM" &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Name="Team name" &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; PivotType="Row" /&gt;<br />&nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;Property Code="POINTS" &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Name="Points" &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;PivotType="Value" &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Type="INT" /&gt;<br />&nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;Property Code="GOALS_FOR" &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;Name="Goals for" &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; PivotType="Value" &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Type="INT" /&gt;<br />&nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;Property Code="GOALS_AGAINST" &nbsp;Name="Goals against" &nbsp; &nbsp; PivotType="Value" &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Type="INT" /&gt;<br />&nbsp; &nbsp; <strong>&lt;Property Code="GOAL_DIFF" &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;Name="Goal difference" &nbsp; PivotType="CalculatedField" &nbsp; Equation="GOALS_FOR - GOALS_AGAINST" /&gt;</strong><br />&nbsp; &lt;/FieldProperties&gt;<br />&nbsp; &lt;Fields&gt;<br />&nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;Field &nbsp; SEASON="13/14" &nbsp; TEAM="Arsenal" &nbsp; &nbsp; POINTS="79" &nbsp; GOALS_FOR="68" &nbsp; GOALS_AGAINST="41" /&gt;<br />&nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;Field &nbsp; SEASON="13/14" &nbsp; TEAM="Man Utd" &nbsp; &nbsp; POINTS="64" &nbsp; GOALS_FOR="64" &nbsp; GOALS_AGAINST="43" /&gt;<br />&nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;Field &nbsp; SEASON="13/14" &nbsp; TEAM="Liverpool" &nbsp; POINTS="84" &nbsp; GOALS_FOR="101" &nbsp;GOALS_AGAINST="50" /&gt;<br />&nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;Field &nbsp; SEASON="13/14" &nbsp; TEAM="Chelsea" &nbsp; &nbsp; POINTS="82" &nbsp; GOALS_FOR="71" &nbsp; GOALS_AGAINST="27" /&gt;<br />&nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;Field &nbsp; SEASON="14/15" &nbsp; TEAM="Arsenal" &nbsp; &nbsp; POINTS="75" &nbsp; GOALS_FOR="71" &nbsp; GOALS_AGAINST="36" /&gt;<br />&nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;Field &nbsp; SEASON="14/15" &nbsp; TEAM="Man Utd" &nbsp; &nbsp; POINTS="70" &nbsp; GOALS_FOR="62" &nbsp; GOALS_AGAINST="37" /&gt;<br />&nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;Field &nbsp; SEASON="14/15" &nbsp; TEAM="Liverpool" &nbsp; POINTS="62" &nbsp; GOALS_FOR="52" &nbsp; GOALS_AGAINST="48" /&gt;<br />&nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;Field &nbsp; SEASON="14/15" &nbsp; TEAM="Chelsea" &nbsp; &nbsp; POINTS="87" &nbsp; GOALS_FOR="73" &nbsp; GOALS_AGAINST="32" /&gt;<br />&nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;Field &nbsp; SEASON="15/16" &nbsp; TEAM="Arsenal" &nbsp; &nbsp; POINTS="71" &nbsp; GOALS_FOR="65" &nbsp; GOALS_AGAINST="36" /&gt;<br />&nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;Field &nbsp; SEASON="15/16" &nbsp; TEAM="Man Utd" &nbsp; &nbsp; POINTS="66" &nbsp; GOALS_FOR="49" &nbsp; GOALS_AGAINST="35" /&gt;<br />&nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;Field &nbsp; SEASON="15/16" &nbsp; TEAM="Liverpool" &nbsp; POINTS="60" &nbsp; GOALS_FOR="63" &nbsp; GOALS_AGAINST="50" /&gt;<br />&nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;Field &nbsp; SEASON="15/16" &nbsp; TEAM="Chelsea" &nbsp; &nbsp; POINTS="50" &nbsp; GOALS_FOR="59" &nbsp; GOALS_AGAINST="53" /&gt;<br />&nbsp; &lt;/Fields&gt;<br />&lt;/Results&gt;</pre>
<br />
<strong><span style="color: #ff0000;">NOTE: In the equation attribute we can only use CODES of other properties and these properties must be of PivotType "Value"</span></strong><br />
<br />
<img alt="" src="/media/Canvas/CanvasCalculatedFields1.png" />
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p><strong><span style="font-size: 16px;">3. Grand totals of calculated fields</span></strong><br />
<br />
<strong><span style="font-size: 14px; color: #ff0000;">NOTE: Calculated fields have no aggregation types. Setting an "AggregationType" attribute on a property of type "CalculatedField" has no effect!</span></strong><br />
<br />
It may be surprising how grand totals for calculated fields are calculated. Let's take the example from the paragraph above focusing on only one team:<br />
<br />
</p>
<pre>&lt;Results&gt;<br />&nbsp; &lt;FieldProperties&gt;<br />&nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;Property Code="SEASON" &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Name="Season" &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;PivotType="Column" /&gt;<br />&nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;Property Code="TEAM" &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Name="Team name" &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; PivotType="Row" /&gt;<br />&nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;Property Code="POINTS" &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Name="Points" &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;PivotType="Value" &nbsp; Type="INT" &nbsp; Format="N0" /&gt;<br />&nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;Property Code="GOALS_FOR" &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;Name="Goals for" &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; PivotType="Value" &nbsp; Type="INT" &nbsp; Format="N0" /&gt;<br />&nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;Property Code="GOALS_AGAINST" &nbsp;Name="Goals against" &nbsp; &nbsp; PivotType="Value" &nbsp; Type="INT" &nbsp; Format="N0" /&gt;<br />&nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;Property Code="GOAL_DIFF" &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;Name="Goal difference" &nbsp; PivotType="CalculatedField"      Format="N0" &nbsp; Equation="GOALS_FOR - GOALS_AGAINST" /&gt;<br />&nbsp; &lt;/FieldProperties&gt;<br />&nbsp; &lt;Fields&gt;<br />&nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;Field &nbsp; SEASON="13/14" &nbsp; TEAM="Arsenal" &nbsp; &nbsp; POINTS="79" &nbsp; GOALS_FOR="68" &nbsp; GOALS_AGAINST="41" /&gt;<br />&nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;Field &nbsp; SEASON="14/15" &nbsp; TEAM="Arsenal" &nbsp; &nbsp; POINTS="75" &nbsp; GOALS_FOR="71" &nbsp; GOALS_AGAINST="36" /&gt;<br />&nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;Field &nbsp; SEASON="15/16" &nbsp; TEAM="Arsenal" &nbsp; &nbsp; POINTS="71" &nbsp; GOALS_FOR="65" &nbsp; GOALS_AGAINST="36" /&gt;<br />&nbsp; &lt;/Fields&gt;<br />&lt;/Results&gt;</pre>
<p><img alt="" src="/media/Canvas/CanvasCalculatedFields2.png" /></p>
<p>
On the picture above "Goal difference" is a calculated field with the equation defined in the following way:
</p>
<pre>Equation="GOALS_FOR - GOALS_AGAINST"</pre>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>This doesn't convert to:</p>
<pre>Equation = 204 - 113 = 91</pre>
<p>as the user would expect.</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p><span style="line-height: 1.42857;">Instead, the pivot grid calculates this value in the following way:</span></p>
<pre>Equation = (68 + 71 + 65) - (41 + 36 + 36) = 204 - 133 = 91</pre>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>In this example it doesn't really matter as the result of the equation is exactly the same.</p>
<p>
However, let's change our xml a little, so that "Goals for" and "Goals against" are averaged instead of summed.<br />
The xml after this change would like like this:<br />
<br />
</p>
<pre>&lt;Results&gt;<br />&nbsp; &lt;FieldProperties&gt;<br />&nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;Property Code="SEASON" &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Name="Season" &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;PivotType="Column" /&gt;<br />&nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;Property Code="TEAM" &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Name="Team name" &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; PivotType="Row" /&gt;<br />&nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;Property Code="POINTS" &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Name="Points" &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;PivotType="Value" &nbsp; Type="INT" &nbsp; Format="N0" &nbsp; <strong>AggregationType="AVG"</strong> /&gt;<br />&nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;Property Code="GOALS_FOR" &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;Name="Goals for" &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; PivotType="Value" &nbsp; Type="INT" &nbsp; Format="N0" &nbsp; <strong>AggregationType="AVG"</strong> /&gt;<br />&nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;Property Code="GOALS_AGAINST" &nbsp;Name="Goals against" &nbsp; &nbsp; PivotType="Value" &nbsp; Type="INT" &nbsp; Format="N0" &nbsp; <strong>AggregationType="AVG"</strong> /&gt;<br />&nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;Property Code="GOAL_DIFF" &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;Name="Goal difference" &nbsp; PivotType="CalculatedField" &nbsp;    Format="N0"   Equation="GOALS_FOR - GOALS_AGAINST" /&gt;<br />&nbsp; &lt;/FieldProperties&gt;<br />&nbsp; &lt;Fields&gt;<br />&nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;Field &nbsp; SEASON="13/14" &nbsp; TEAM="Arsenal" &nbsp; &nbsp; POINTS="79" &nbsp; GOALS_FOR="68" &nbsp; GOALS_AGAINST="41" /&gt;<br />&nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;Field &nbsp; SEASON="14/15" &nbsp; TEAM="Arsenal" &nbsp; &nbsp; POINTS="75" &nbsp; GOALS_FOR="71" &nbsp; GOALS_AGAINST="36" /&gt;<br />&nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;Field &nbsp; SEASON="15/16" &nbsp; TEAM="Arsenal" &nbsp; &nbsp; POINTS="71" &nbsp; GOALS_FOR="65" &nbsp; GOALS_AGAINST="36" /&gt;<br />&nbsp; &lt;/Fields&gt;<br />&lt;/Results&gt;</pre>
<p><img alt="" src="/media/Canvas/CanvasCalculatedFields3.png" />
</p>
<p>You can now clearly see which way the grand totals are calculated.</p>
